economiccomplexity 0.3

Country-product bipartite network projections

projections.Rd

rca computes complexity indices following the definitions from Mariani et al. (2015)

projections(proximity_c, proximity_p, cutoff_c = 0.2, cutoff_p = 0.4,
  compute = "both", tbl = TRUE, from_c = "from", to_c = "to",
  value_c = "value", from_p = "from", to_p = "to",
  value_p = "value")

Arguments

proximity_c

matrix or data frame with product proximity values
proximity_p

matrix or data frame with country proximity values
cutoff_c

all the links with a proximity below this value will be removed from the country projection (by default is 0.2)
cutoff_p

all the links with a proximity below this value will be removed from the product projection (by default is 0.4)
compute

"country", "product" or "both" (default) projections
tbl

TRUE (default) returns a data.frame and FALSE returns a matrix
from_c

column containing origin (applies only if proximity_c is a data.frame)
to_c

column containing destination (applies only if proximity_c is a data.frame)
value_c

column containing proximity values (applies only if proximity_c is a data.frame)
from_p

column containing origin (applies only if proximity_p is a data.frame)
to_p

column containing destination (applies only if proximity_p is a data.frame)
value_p

column containing proximity values (applies only if proximity_p is a data.frame)

Value

A list with two data frames or matrices.

Details

Given a matrix of \(C\times C\) with country proximity values and a matrix of \(P\times P\) with product proximity values, this function obtains a simplified network in two steps: 1) creates a network skeleton by appliying the minimum spanning tree algorithm from the igraph package, but multiplying proximities by minus one, so that the strongest links are considered for the network skeleton 2) append additional links to the skeleton by aading the links with proximity values above a user-defined cutoff

References

For more information about visualizing bipartite networks projections see:

Goh K, Cusick ME, Valle D, Childs B, Vidal M, Barabási A (2007). “The human disease network.” Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, 104(21), 8685--8690. ISSN 0027-8424, doi: 10.1073/pnas.0701361104 , https://www.pnas.org/content/104/21/8685.full.pdf, https://www.pnas.org/content/104/21/8685.

Hausmann R, Hidalgo C, Bustos S, Coscia M, Simoes A, Yildirim M (2014). The atlas of economic complexity: Mapping paths to prosperity. MIT Press. doi: 10.7551/mitpress/9647.001.0001 .

and the references therein.

See also

proximity

Examples

projections(
  ec_output_demo$proximity$proximity_c,
  ec_output_demo$proximity$proximity_p
)
#> $projection_c
